lines: 1. Ndzi Rhandza Ku Tiva Yesu, Ndzi Va Byela Hi Tintswalo,
Ndzi Kuma Ku Ponisiwa, Eka Loya Ndzi Feleke
Timhaka Ta Yesu, Ndzi Byele Ha Tona,
Mahungu Ya Muponisi, Yena Loya Ndzi Feleke.
2. Ndzi Dyodzise Hi Ta Yesu, Ni Ta Ku Kwetsima Kakwe,
Moya Wo Kwetsima Tana, U Ndzi Dyondzisa Ta Yesu.
3. Dyondzani Hi Rito Rakwe, Tshinelani Hi Xikhongelo,
Ndzi Yingisa Rito Rakwe, Ndzi Mukela Ri Va Ranga.
4. Ta Xiluvelo Xa Yesu, Mudyandzhaka Wa Xikwembu,
Vula Ta Mfumo Wa Yena. Ni Taku Vuya Ka Yena.
